title: Dev Jose Sanchez
intro_title: I'm Jose Sanchez Web Developer I build accessible, responsive user interfaces
about_p1: I'm a junior front‑end developer focused on building accessible, responsive interfaces using HTML, CSS and modern utility-first tooling like Tailwind. I enjoy turning designs into working UI and learning best practices for performance and maintainability.
about_p2: I have hands-on experience creating reusable components with JavaScript and React, basic knowledge of Shopify Liquid for simple theme tweaks, and familiarity with Git and SQL. I learn quickly from feedback, follow guidance from senior engineers, and aim to deliver clear, testable code.
title1: Discover Your Passion for Gastronomy — Culinary School Landing
title2: Warm, Personalized Pediatric Dentistry — Dental Clinic Website
title4: Personal Real Estate Advisor — Real Estate Landing Page
title5: Casio G‑SHOCK Watch Store — Limited Edition Landing (Built with Shopify)
title6: Discover Nike’s New Releases — Sneaker Landing Page (Built with Shopify)
description1: Promotional site for a culinary school offering courses and workshops, featuring calls-to-action for more information or enrollment.
description2: Website for a dental practice focused on pediatric (and geriatric) care, emphasizing empathetic patient care, prevention, and tailored services.
description3: Shop/landing showcasing artisanal nougats, flavor varieties and a clear call-to-action to place orders or contact the distributor.
description4: Website for a real estate advisor promoting buying, selling and renting services, featuring appointment scheduling and trust-building elements.
description5: E‑commerce landing built with Shopify for a limited‑edition collection: high‑impact hero, promotional slider and a product grid with clear buy calls‑to‑action.
testimonial_1_text: Jose joined our team as a junior front‑ender and quickly became reliable for building small features. He followed design specs closely and asked good questions when unsure — delivered work on time.
testimonial_2_text: Very collaborative and coachable. Jose accepted feedback from seniors, improved accessibility issues, and iterated until the component behaved consistently across devices.
testimonial_3_text: Practical with Git and debugging. He helped identify a data mismatch in our staging environment and fixed UI edge cases. Great attitude and willingness to learn.
testimonial_4_text: Jose delivers readable code and communicates progress clearly. As a junior he shows strong potential and quickly adapts to project needs.
numbers_happy_customers_text: I've partnered with 4+ small businesses and clients to launch websites and deliver front‑end improvements prioritizing clarity and usability.
numbers_projects_completed_text: 14+ small projects: landing pages, feature components and simple Shopify tweaks — focused on clarity, responsiveness and accessibility.
numbers_lines_of_code_text: 8k+ lines of project code (HTML/CSS/JS), mostly modular components and utility classes, maintained in Git repositories.
numbers_positive_feedback_text: 12+ positive notes from clients and mentors praising punctuality, clarity of communication and eagerness to learn.
pfooter: I'm available for freelance and full‑time opportunities. I build accessible, maintainable front‑end interfaces and enjoy collaborating with designers and engineers. Send me a message to discuss your project.
